page.title: 06A day in the life of Angela.
page.content: I get up at 7.00, get dressed, make my bed and go downstairs. My breakfast is a cup of tea and some cornflakes. After breakfast I put my shoes on and go with my brother and father to take my mum to work. After that I make my dad some coffee and I then get ready for school. At 8.30 I begin to walk down to Lancaster Lane C.P. School which opens at 9.00. We have assembly first and then maths till playtime at 10.45. At playtime we often play skipping. We go in at 11.00 and start again by learning a spelling rule for a test on Thursday. At 11.30 we have reading until dinner time which is from 12.00 until 1.15. In the afternoon we do comprehension till playtime at 2.15, then from 2.30 we do geography until hometime at 3.15. When I get home I change to go and play with my friend Emma.
